seo.title: FindMyStuff | Bringing back lost objects
seo.description: Find lost object through innovative use of QR code
seo.keywords: lost, object, phone, smartphone, gsm, track, find, qr, code, find, my, stuff, forget, keys, wallet, bag, found

heading: Bringing back lost objects.
description: Take care of your stuff ! Never lose your items again thanks to the system we have implemented. We will remunerate the one who will find and give your lost item back to you !

hiw.title: How It Works
hiw.step1: To register, scan the QR code on the back of your new product.
hiw.step2: Now that your account is activated, anyone who finds your lost item can scan the QR code and report the finding. We will indicate to him the 1 400 associated pickup parcel points in Belgium where he will be able to deposit your item for a monetary reward or a donation offered to a non-profit association.
hiw.step3: You just have to wait for your item to get back ! You will be notified when it has been delivered into your favorite pickup parcelpoint that you have chosen during the activation. The first back shipping is free !
